name: WB TV Shows Online Trivia | Mixture: Networks | 10 Questions

questions.text: This WB show features an actress named Leslie Bibb.
questions.explanation:
Popular.

	'Popular' is one of the WB's most 'popular' shows!

questions.text: Which WB show is a spin-off of 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer'?
On 'Charmed', what does Piper do for a living?
On '7th Heaven', what are the twin's names?
On 'Dawson's Creek', Joey's father was arrested and sent away from the family for doing what?
questions.explanation:
selling drugs.

	Remember when he came back?

questions.text: On 'Roswell', what was the guidance counselor's real identity?
questions.correct: She was a secret agent for the US government
options: she was a former hippie on the run
she was a scientist trying to perform experiments on the aliens
questions.explanation: She was a secret agent for the US government.

questions.text: On the season finale (2000) of 'Popular', Carmen thinks that she is:
options: responsible for Miss Glass's so-called death
questions.explanation:
pregnant.

	She says she is pregnant, but we'll never find out who the father is until next season.

questions.correct: she is the president of the international Hanson club
options: she used to have webbed feet
she dated Josh when he was still with Brooke
questions.explanation: she is the president of the international Hanson club.

questions.text: How did Brooke and Sam on 'Popular' decide who got to use the right sink?
Who do the cheerleaders on 'Popular' worship?
